name: Zangeki no Reginleiv
overview: Ragnarok is upon us. The giants have emerged and threaten to annihilate creation. Join forces with angelic emissaries Frøy and Freia to counter the carnage and bring a new era to the world. Use the pointer of the Wii Remote across the screen to slash through the cursed legion, and co-operate with 3 other players online to keep the waves of fiends at bay.
